headline: Warren Buffett Buys a Dividend Stock Up 4,400% in 15 Years, but Sends Wall Street a $348 Billion Warning
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reported a record $348 billion in cash and Treasury bills on its balance sheet in March, a warning to Wall Street that stocks are still expensive.  In 1965, Warren Buffett took control of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B).
